content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The Big Mink, the June 22, 1950, episode from Dragnet.

(29:50) This Is Your FBI closes out this week’s episode with their story from October 7, 1949, The Meticulous Mobster.

Download CaseClosed747

14 years of commercial free podcasts! Relic Radio is fueled by the generosity of its listeners. If you’d like to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more info. Thank you!
